price: Mun saukar da littafi a gareka da Gaskiya ka bautawa Allah kana mai tsarkake Addini a gare shi
arabic: إِنَّآ أَنزَلۡنَآ إِلَيۡكَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ فَٱعۡبُدِ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡلِصٗا لَّهُ ٱلدِّينَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: innā anzalnā ilayka al-kitāba bil-ḥaqi fa-uʿ'budi al-laha mukh'liṣan lahu al-dīna
